about_the_game:
Grey and Green is the first free DLC story pack. Destination to a tide-locked planet, choosing between Mechanical upgrade or Genetic modification, and finding the way out for the divided Hypercephalic Ants civilizations.

Divided Civilization

Grey and Green introduce a twin civilization formed by one species, Sociotribe and Silvicolony.
Communal Colony coexists with the giant plant Zran on the bright side of the planet, they can modify their body through genetic technology.
Swarm Forest lives on the dark side of the planet. In the eternal cold and darkness, they live through mechanical power.

New Celestial Projects

Construct a planetary computer to rehearse the possible future of the Sociotribe and Silvicolony, helping correctors identify the hidden truth inside the two civilizations.

Landscape Reshape

Your choice influences their occupation of this planet.
Grey and Green will engage above the planet and showcase to the Amender.

Discover a New Form of Intelligent life

Deep dive into the new story, exploring classic topics that have been lingering around science fiction themes for many years.
Based on the intelligent species - Hypercephalic Ants, it falls upon you to determine their lives and future.
